## FE intensity of GDP, linegraph (by GDP)

```{r FE intensity of GDP-linegraph}
items <- c(
  "FE|Transport pGDP",
	"FE|Buildings pGDP",
  "FE|Industry pGDP")

data %>% 
  filter(variable %in% items) ->
  d

d %>% 
  filter(region == mainReg, scenario != "historical") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(gdp, value)) + 
  facet_wrap(vars(variable), scales="free_y") +
  geom_line(aes(linetype=scenario)) +
  geom_point(data = d %>% filter(region == mainReg, scenario == "historical"), aes(shape = model)) +
  ylab("FE Intensity (MJ/US$2005)") + xlab("GDP PPP pCap (kUS$2005)")

d %>% 
  filter(region != mainReg, scenario != "historical") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(gdp, value, color=region)) + 
  facet_wrap(vars(variable), scales="free_y") +
  geom_line(aes(linetype=scenario)) +
  geom_point(data = d %>% filter(region != mainReg, scenario == "historical"), aes(shape = model)) +
  ylab("FE Intensity (MJ/US$2005)") + xlab("GDP PPP pCap (kUS$2005)")
```

## Kaya-Decomposition

```{r kaya calc}
# TODO: plot description, units, colors
# Not robust wrt change of unit.
data %>% 
  filter(scenario != "historical") %>% 
  filter(variable %in% c("Emi|CO2|Energy", "FE", "GDP|MER", "Population")) %>% 
  select(model, scenario, region, variable, unit, period, value) ->
  d
d %>% 
  select(variable, unit) %>% 
  distinct() ->
  old_units
d %>% 
  select(-unit) %>% 
  pivot_wider(names_from=variable, values_from=value) %>% 
  mutate(
    emiCO2_by_FE = `Emi|CO2|Energy`/FE,
    FE_by_GDP = FE/`GDP|MER`,
    GDP_by_Pop = `GDP|MER`/Population,
    `Emi|CO2|Energy` = NULL, FE = NULL, `GDP|MER` = NULL) %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    c(emiCO2_by_FE, FE_by_GDP, GDP_by_Pop, Population), 
    names_to="variable",
    values_to="value") -> kaya
kaya_units <- tribble(
  ~variable, ~unit,
  "Population", "million",
  "GDP_by_Pop", "billion US$2005/yr/million",
  "FE_by_GDP", "EJ/billion US$2005",
  "emiCO2_by_FE", "EJ/Mt CO2")
kaya %>%
  left_join(kaya_units) ->
  kaya

ref_year <- 2005
kaya %>% filter(period==ref_year) %>% select(-period) %>% rename(ref_value=value) -> kaya_ref
kaya %>% 
  left_join(kaya_ref) %>% 
  mutate(
    value = value / ref_value,
    unit = paste0("relative to ", ref_year),
    ref_value = NULL) ->
  kaya_rel
```


```{r kaya plot}
kaya %>% 
  ggplot(aes(period, value, color=region)) + 
  geom_point() + geom_line() +
  facet_grid(vars(variable), vars(scenario), scales="free_y")

kaya_rel %>% 
  ggplot(aes(period, value, color=region)) + 
  geom_point() + geom_line() +
  facet_grid(vars(variable), vars(scenario), scales="free_y")
```

```{r kaya_vars plot}
kaya_vars <- kaya_units$variable
walk(kaya_vars, showLinePlots, data=kaya_rel)
```
